00026 TILE_IMAGERY *LoadTileSurface(  char * cFilename )
00027 {
00028       // Add tile surface
00029       PTILE_IMAGERY  pTileSurf = NULL;    
00030       VOBJECT_DESC   VObjectDesc;
00031       HVOBJECT             hVObject;
00032       HIMAGE                         hImage;
00033       SGPFILENAME                               cStructureFilename;
00034       STR                                                         cEndOfName;
00035       STRUCTURE_FILE_REF *    pStructureFileRef;
00036       BOOLEAN                                               fOk;
00037 
00038 
00039       hImage = CreateImage( cFilename, IMAGE_ALLDATA );
00040       if (hImage == NULL)
00041       {
00042             // Report error
00043             SET_ERROR( "Could not load tile file: %s", cFilename );
00044             return( NULL );
00045       }
00046 
00047       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMHIMAGE;
00048       VObjectDesc.hImage = hImage;
00049 
00050       hVObject = CreateVideoObject( &VObjectDesc );
00051 
00052       if ( hVObject == NULL )
00053       {
00054             // Report error
00055             SET_ERROR( "Could not load tile file: %s", cFilename );
00056             // Video Object will set error conition.]
00057             DestroyImage( hImage );
00058             return( NULL );
00059       }
00060 
00061       // Load structure data, if any.
00062       // Start by hacking the image filename into that for the structure data
00063       strcpy( cStructureFilename, cFilename );
00064       cEndOfName = strchr( cStructureFilename, '.' );
00065       if (cEndOfName != NULL)
00066       {
00067             cEndOfName++;
00068             *cEndOfName = '\0';
00069       }
00070       else
00071       {
00072             strcat( cStructureFilename, "." );
00073       }
00074       strcat( cStructureFilename, STRUCTURE_FILE_EXTENSION );
00075       if (FileExists( cStructureFilename ))
00076       {
00077             pStructureFileRef = LoadStructureFile( cStructureFilename );
00078             if (pStructureFileRef == NULL || hVObject->usNumberOfObjects != pStructureFileRef->usNumberOfStructures)
00079             {
00080                   DestroyImage( hImage );
00081                   DeleteVideoObject( hVObject );
00082                   SET_ERROR(  "Structure file error: %s", cStructureFilename );
00083                   return( NULL );
00084             }
00085             
00086             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, cStructureFilename );
00087       
00088             fOk = AddZStripInfoToVObject( hVObject, pStructureFileRef, FALSE, 0 );
00089             if (fOk == FALSE)
00090             {
00091                   DestroyImage( hImage );
00092                   DeleteVideoObject( hVObject );
00093                   SET_ERROR(  "ZStrip creation error: %s", cStructureFilename );
00094                   return( NULL );
00095             }
00096             
00097       }
00098       else
00099       {
00100             pStructureFileRef = NULL;
00101       }
00102 
00103       pTileSurf = (PTILE_IMAGERY) MemAlloc( sizeof( TILE_IMAGERY ) );
00104 
00105       // Set all values to zero
00106       memset( pTileSurf, 0, sizeof( TILE_IMAGERY ) );
00107 
00108       pTileSurf->vo                                                     = hVObject;
00109       pTileSurf->pStructureFileRef  = pStructureFileRef;
00110 
00111       if (pStructureFileRef && pStructureFileRef->pAuxData != NULL)
00112       {
00113             pTileSurf->pAuxData = pStructureFileRef->pAuxData;
00114             pTileSurf->pTileLocData = pStructureFileRef->pTileLocData;
00115       }
00116       else if (hImage->uiAppDataSize == hVObject->usNumberOfObjects * sizeof( AuxObjectData ))
00117       {
00118             // Valid auxiliary data, so make a copy of it for TileSurf
00119             pTileSurf->pAuxData = (AuxObjectData *) MemAlloc( hImage->uiAppDataSize );
00120             if ( pTileSurf->pAuxData == NULL)
00121             {
00122                   DestroyImage( hImage );
00123                   DeleteVideoObject( hVObject );
00124                   return( NULL );
00125             }
00126             memcpy( pTileSurf->pAuxData, hImage->pAppData, hImage->uiAppDataSize );
00127       }
00128       else
00129       {
00130             pTileSurf->pAuxData = NULL;
00131       }
00132       // the hImage is no longer needed
00133       DestroyImage( hImage );
00134 
00135   return( pTileSurf );
00136 }
00137 
00138 
00139 void DeleteTileSurface( PTILE_IMAGERY     pTileSurf )
00140 {
00141       if ( pTileSurf->pStructureFileRef != NULL )
00142       {
00143             FreeStructureFile( pTileSurf->pStructureFileRef );
00144       }
00145       else
00146       {
00147             // If a structure file exists, it will free the auxdata.
00148             // Since there is no structure file in this instance, we
00149             // free it ourselves.
00150             if (pTileSurf->pAuxData != NULL)
00151             {
00152                   MemFree( pTileSurf->pAuxData );
00153             }
00154       }
00155 
00156       DeleteVideoObject( pTileSurf->vo );
00157       MemFree( pTileSurf );
00158 }

00161 extern void GetRootName( INT8 *pDestStr, INT8 *pSrcStr );

00163 
00164 void SetRaisedObjectFlag( char *cFilename, TILE_IMAGERY *pTileSurf )
00165 {
00166       INT32 cnt = 0;
00167       CHAR8 cRootFile[ 128 ];
00168       UINT8 ubRaisedObjectFiles[][80] =
00169       {
00170             "bones",
00171             "bones2",
00172             "grass2",
00173             "grass3",
00174             "l_weed3",
00175             "litter",
00176             "miniweed",
00177             "sblast",
00178             "sweeds",
00179             "twigs",
00180             "wing",
00181             "1"
00182       };
00183 
00184       // Loop through array of RAISED objecttype imagery and
00185       // set global value...
00186       if ( ( pTileSurf->fType >= DEBRISWOOD && pTileSurf->fType <= DEBRISWEEDS ) || pTileSurf->fType == DEBRIS2MISC || pTileSurf->fType == ANOTHERDEBRIS )
00187       {
00188             GetRootName( (INT8 *)cRootFile, (INT8 *)cFilename );
00189             while( ubRaisedObjectFiles[ cnt ][ 0 ] != '1' )
00190             {
00191                   if ( _stricmp( ubRaisedObjectFiles[ cnt ], cRootFile ) == 0 )
00192                   {           
00193                         pTileSurf->bRaisedObjectType = TRUE;
00194                   }
00195 
00196                   cnt++;
00197             }
00198       }
00199 }
